definitions.definition: ( zoology ) A specialized cell , group of cells, or organ of endothelial origin in the human or animal body that synthesizes a chemical substance , such as hormones or breast milk , and releases it, often into the bloodstream ( endocrine gland ) or into cavities inside the body or its outer surface ( exocrine gland ).

subdefinitions.definition: ( anatomy ) A structure resembling a gland, especially a lymph node .

definitions.definition: ( botany ) A secretory structure on the surface of an organ .

main_definition: ( zoology ) A specialized cell , group of cells, or organ of endothelial origin in the human or animal body that synthesizes a chemical substance , such as hormones or breast milk , and releases it, often into the bloodstream ( endocrine gland ) or into cavities inside the body or its outer surface ( exocrine gland ).
secondary_definitions: ( botany ) A secretory structure on the surface of an organ .

definitions.definition: A compressable cylindrical case and its contents around a shaft where it passes through a barrier , intended to prevent the passage of a fluid past the barrier, used for example around a ship ’s propeller shaft or around a tap , valve or faucet .

main_definition: ( mechanics ) A compressable cylindrical case and its contents around a shaft where it passes through a barrier , intended to prevent the passage of a fluid past the barrier, used for example around a ship ’s propeller shaft or around a tap , valve or faucet .
